A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Firstly let me start by saying that this is a NO-SPOILER review. 

I am a huge star wars fans\, unashamedly so. Why I love this film so much  is that it combines several plot lines and creates a cohesive story that advances old and new characters into a very unique story within a galaxy far far and away. 

for me what this film does is answers the main question I wanted to know\, How powerful is Luke Skywalker? NO spoilers here but it doesn't disappoint.
